UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Rational Design of Plant Hairpin-like Peptide EcAMP1: Structural-Functional Correlations to Reveal Antibacterial and Antifungal Activity.
Literature.Author: Barashkova AS, Ryazantsev DY, Rogozhin EA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fusarium oxysporum TSKHA-4(IC50=15.8±1.6µM),Fusarium graminearum VKM F-1668(IC50=8.5±1.2µM),Fusarium solani(IC50=7.8±0.7µM)
